MSG_NO_BLACKLIST: Hier gibt es keine Wörter auf der schwarzen Liste!
MSG_BLACKLIST_ADD_SUCCESS: {} wurde auf die schwarze Liste gesetzt!
ERR_BAD_REQUEST: Sag mir, welche Wörter ich auf die schwarze Liste setzen soll
MSG_REMOVED_SUCCESS: <{} wurde von der schwarzen Liste entfernt!
ERR_NOT_VALID_TRIGGER_MULTIPLE: None of these triggers exist, so they weren't removed.
ERR_NOT_ALL_VALID_TRIGGER: Removed {} triggers from the blacklist. {} did not exist, so were not removed.
ERR_REMOVE_BAD_REQUEST: Sag mir, welche Wörter ich von der schwarzen Liste entfernen soll.
ERR_CONSOLE_CANT_DELETE_MESSAGE: Es gab einen Fehler beim Löschen der Nachrichten auf der schwarzen Liste.
CHAT_SETTINGS: Das sind die Wörter auf der schwarzen Liste:{}.
HELP:
Blacklists are used to stop certain triggers from being said in a group. Any time the trigger is mentioned, the message will immediately be deleted. A good combo is sometimes to pair this up with warn filters!

*NOTE:* blacklists do not affect group admins.

 - /blacklist: View the current blacklisted words.

*Admin only:*
 - /addblacklist <triggers>: Add a trigger to the blacklist. Each line is considered one trigger, so using different lines will allow you to add multiple triggers.
 - /unblacklist <triggers>: Remove triggers from the blacklist. Same newline logic applies here, so you can remove multiple triggers at once.
 - /rmblacklist <triggers>: Same as above.
